name: Mind the gap: why does energy use fall so far short of predictions in new buildings?
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: The energy performance of new buildings does not always match predictions calculated at design stage and the differences can be substantial. This session looks at the factors contributing to these discrepancies and suggests best practice for ensuring that a building operates as efficiently as designed.
